perturbation.original_text: TERM: The rights granted hereunder shall be effective as of the Effective Date and shall expire on December 31, 2006 (the "Term"); provided, however, that with respect to each Property, including Robots, Kingdom of Heaven, Mr. and Mrs. Smith, In Her Shoes, Idiocracy (Oww My Balls) and Ice Age II, all right and licenses granted herein will continue in full force and effect until March 31, 2008.
perturbation.changed_text: TERM: The rights granted hereunder shall be effective as of the Effective Date and shall expire on December 31, 2006 (the "Term"); provided, however, that with respect to each Property, including Robots, Kingdom of Heaven, Mr. and Mrs. Smith, In Her Shoes, Idiocracy (Oww My Balls) and Ice Age II, all right and licenses granted herein will continue in full force and effect until March 31, 2008, unless earlier terminated at the discretion of Fox.
perturbation.explanation: Adding 'unless earlier terminated at the discretion of Fox' introduces a contradiction. While contracts can have termination clauses, giving Fox unfettered discretion to terminate contradicts the 'full force and effect until March 31, 2008' clause. This creates uncertainty and could be viewed as an unenforceable clause under contract law.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General principles of contract law regarding enforceability of clauses and good faith.

perturbation.original_text: Except as herein expressly amended or by necessary implication modified by this Amendment, the Agreement in all other respects is hereby ratified and shall continue in full force and effect.
perturbation.changed_text: Except as herein expressly amended or ambiguously modified by this Amendment, the Agreement in all other respects is hereby ratified and shall continue under revision.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'necessarily' to 'ambiguously' increases the chance of misinterpretation of modifications and stating it is under 'revision' creates uncertainty if the contract is binding or not.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General principles of contract law regarding enforceability of clauses and agreement validity.

perturbation.original_text: The notice information for Licensee in Section 17(a) of the Agreement shall be amended such that "Paul Zuzelo" is deleted and replaced with "General Counsel", and such that the email address for Paul Zuzelo is deleted.
perturbation.changed_text: The notice information for Licensee in Section 17(a) of the Agreement shall be amended such that "Paul Zuzelo" is deleted and replaced with "Legal Department", and such that the email address for Paul Zuzelo is deleted.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'General Counsel' with 'Legal Department' may create confusion and increase legal risk if the legal department is not clearly defined or has an undefined position or scope, thus creating more ambiguity.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Principles of contract law regarding clarity and specificity in defining roles for notification purposes.
